dkeep.logic

Class Guard

    • dkeep.logic.Elements
      • dkeep.logic.Guard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class Guard
extends Elements
    Guard.java - class to the guard representation in the game
    Author:
    Rui Guedes and César Pinho

    • Field Detail

      • position

        public int position
        Index of the route.

      • state

        public char state
        Representation mark

      • stop

        public int stop
        Number of plays that the Drunken guard stays sleeping

      • direction

        public boolean direction
        Direction of the patrol route. If true travels the route in the normal direction otherwise if false travels in the reverse direction.

      • guardRoute

        public char[] guardRoute
        Patrol route

    • Constructor Detail

      • Guard

        public Guard(Elements guard,
             char[] guardRoute)
        Class constructor specifying coordinates and patrol route
        Parameters:
        guard - coordinates of the guard
        guardRoute - movements to navigate the patrol route

    • Method Detail

      • guardMovement

        public abstract boolean guardMovement()
        Change the guard position according with the patrol route. The patrol is complete when position back to the begin of route. When patrol is complete, change of guard (shift).
        Returns:
        If the patrol route is complete return true, otherwise return false.

      • guardMove

        public void guardMove()
        Call the changeCoordinates function with the right parameter take into account the direction of the guard movement. If the direction is normal, the parameter will be the next move of the route. Otherwise, if the direction is inverse, the parameter will be the inverse of the previous move of the route.

      • changeCoordinates

        public void changeCoordinates(char move)
        Increment or decrement one of the coordinates depending of the direction of the movement.

        Up (w) - increment x coordinate;

        Right (d) - increment y coordinate;

        Down (s) - decrement x coordinate;

        Left (a) - decrement y coordinate.

        Parameters:
        move - movement of the guard

      • changeGuardRoute

        public void changeGuardRoute(char[] guardRoute)
        Set the existent patrol route for other given.
        Parameters:
        guardRoute - new patrol route
